description: A passenger was arrested on suspicion of being involved in a conspiracy to produce and supply a Class B drug.
title: Arrest after police board flight from Egypt at Manchester Airport
title_page: Arrest after police board flight from Egypt at Manchester Airport - BBC News
maintext:
A passenger on a flight from Egypt has been arrested after officers boarded the plane when it landed in the UK earlier.
Detectives made the arrest at Manchester Airport in the early hours the morning, Greater Manchester Police (GMP) said.
The passenger was arrested on suspicion of being involved in a conspiracy to produce and supply a class B drug.
Police said the arrest was part of Operation Challenger, a programme set up to "dismantle" organised criminal gangs.
